pages.text: Getting lost in the belows time and time again made you carry a bit of $(thing)Chalk$() with you, allowing you to mark your way back out. Sadly these little pieces of Calcite never last long before breaking.

pages.title: Unbreakable Chalk
pages.text: By using Pigments instead of Dye, the $(thing)Chalk$() provides you with a never-ending supply of color.

pages.title: Unbr. Glow Chalk
pages.text: Of course you are able to create unbreakable $(thing)Glow Chalk$(), too.

pages.title: Chalk Colorful Addon
pages.text: Oh, you thought about creating colored chalk, too? Of course those can be made unbreakable, too.
